ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:28:49 [Issue ID 4000-814046] urn:comicvine:4000-814046 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 00:34:40. [Issue ID 2158934]
ComicInfo.Series: Dark Nights: Death Metal Rise of the New God
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Weight of Leadership: The Green Lanterns must combine their powers to help their ship with the survivors of the Multiverse to escape the Bleed to return to Earth 0.
Rise of the New God: While the Darkest Knight and Perpetua battle with the fate of the Multiverse at stake, the Chronicler arrives from the greater Omniverse to chronicle the stories of the Multiverse, which he learns from Psycho-Pirate, Vril Dox, and Metron, which causes Chronicler to take an interest in the Multiverse.
ComicInfo.Title: The Weight of Leadership; Rise of the New God
ComicInfo.Writer: Bryan Edward Hill,James Tynion IV,Bryan Hill,James Tynion IV
